results.abstract: In 1947, up to 28,000 Taiwanese were massacred by Nationalist troops, and Taiwan and China are reckoning with the legacy.

media.caption: Exhibits outside Taipei 228 Memorial Hall in Taiwan on Thursday. Taiwan has made significant progress in eliminating the old Chinese-Taiwanese divisions.

results.title: Taiwan Commemorates a Violent Nationalist Episode, 70 Years Later
